description: The bestselling author calls on parents to take away their children’s phones
title: Jonathan Haidt Blamed Tech for Teen Anxiety. Managing the Blowback Has Become a Full-Time Job.

description: At the office, artificial intelligence is just getting started. Coming next: AI ‘agents’ that can find customers, send emails, and even make phone calls on your behalf. Your job will be to supervise.
title: Virtual Workers Are Here to Take Your Job---and Give You a Promotion
